title: Didi Global, Ulta Beauty, Nvidia: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: New York-listed Didi Global shares fall premarket after carmaker says it plans to delist in U.S.
body:
U.S. stock futures wobbled ahead of the jobs report for November, while oil prices rose after OPEC and a group of Russia-led oil producers agreed to continue pumping more crude.Â Here are the stocks we are tracking before the opening bell.
Write to Joe Wallace at joe.wallace@wsj.com
